lead_paragraph: More than 1,800 veterans received letters this week, cautioning that they may have been exposed to blood-borne diseases while undergoing dental work.
snippet: More than 1,800 veterans received letters this week, cautioning that they may have been exposed to blood-borne diseases while undergoing dental work.

headline.main: Veterans at St. Louis Center Are Told of Exposure Risk
headline.seo: Veterans in St. Louis Area May Have Been Exposed to Diseases
headline.print_headline: Veterans at St. Louis Center Are Told of Exposure Risk
